General.Name: Tailyn Technologies
General.Description: Tailyn Technologies, Inc. engages in the design and manufacture of turnkey solutions for communication and applications sectors in Taiwan. The company offers industrial Ethernet switches comprising unmanaged, lite managed, and managed Ethernet switches; carrier Ethernet products; wireless LAN products; and telecom products. It also provides design, joint-development, manufacturing, associated engineering, and logistic support services. The company was formerly known as Tailyn Communication Company, Ltd. and changed its name to Tailyn Technologies, Inc. in July 2013. Tailyn Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.10, Rong-an Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 33852
